name: tana-tools-for-raycast
title: Tana Tools
description: Convert text, YouTube videos, and web pages to Tana Paste format
author: lisaross

commands.name: quick-clipboard-to-tana
commands.title: Quick Clipboard to Tana
commands.description: Instantly convert clipboard content to Tana Paste format

commands.name: paste-and-edit
commands.title: Paste and Edit for Tana
commands.description: Paste text, edit it, then convert to Tana Paste format

commands.name: youtube-to-tana
commands.title: Youtube to Tana
commands.description: Extract YouTube video information from Chrome, Arc, or Safari and convert to Tana Paste format

commands.name: copy-page-content-to-tana
commands.title: Copy Page Content to Tana
commands.description: Extract all text from the current browser page and convert to Tana Paste format

commands.name: copy-page-content-to-tana-with-selection
commands.title: Copy Page Content to Tana (select Tab)
commands.description: Choose from available browser tabs and extract content to Tana Paste format

preferences.name: videoTag
preferences.title: Video Tag
preferences.description: Supertag to use for YouTube videos (e.g., 'video', 'youtube')

preferences.name: articleTag
preferences.title: Article Tag
preferences.description: Supertag to use for web articles (leave empty for no tag)

preferences.name: transcriptTag
preferences.title: Transcript Tag
preferences.description: Supertag to use for transcripts (leave empty for no tag)

preferences.name: noteTag
preferences.title: Note Tag
preferences.description: Supertag to use for clipboard/plain text notes (leave empty for no tag)

preferences.name: includeAuthor
preferences.title: Include Author Field
preferences.description: Whether to include author/creator information in output
preferences.label: Include author field

preferences.name: includeDescription
preferences.title: Include Description Field
preferences.description: Whether to include description information in output
preferences.label: Include description field
